title: Customized Intermediate Classical Piano Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Requires customized educational design accounting for learners' physical conditions, age, and practical skill levels

learning_goals: Learners can maintain piano-playing postures suitable for their individual physical conditions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can accurately perform two intermediate classical repertoire pieces (e.g., Bach, Mozart) with precise rhythm and expressive interpretation.
Learners improve their performance techniques in two or more areas through collaborative feedback with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
